function.name: OdoPosSub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: sleep
input.desc: sleep duration [-1 : block until receive data ; 0 non-blocking call; N > 0 : sleep during N milliseconds]

function.desc: Read nav_msgs/Odometry.pose.position and load the 3 values into a 3D Vector
